text: Form loses stalk, ranged attack, hunting abilities.
Form offers powerful melee attacks, abilities, and armour.
Form loses powerful melee attacks, abilities, and armour.
Form gains stalk, ranged attack, hunting abilities.
Stealth possesses as much import for a hunter as strength, and Ilja uses both as he can.
Ilja has been blessed by the power of Ursun, and it comes as a great surprise to those who think him a mere man.
